about_the_game:
Discover a world full of excitement and horror!

Get ready to enter an unprecedented adventure that takes you into the deepest depths of darkness. In this game, you will be the hero facing terrifying challenges and complex puzzles while trying to survive in an environment full of dangers.Suspenseful story: Explore hidden secrets and a mysterious story that takes you to places you never expected.

Unique Puzzles: Test your wits against meticulously designed puzzles that require quick thinking and smart solutions.

Terrifying Creatures: Be prepared to face terrifying enemies that appear when you least expect it.

Dynamic Environment: Live a unique experience with a distinctive world design, full of detail and excitement.

Challenge you now:

Can you overcome the challenges and escape with your life? Or will you be stuck in the dark forever? 

A wonderful surprise is coming!

Stay tuned for a new update soon that will add new features and amazing challenges to improve your game experience! Make sure you are ready to discover everything new.
detailed_description:
Discover a world full of excitement and horror!

Get ready to enter an unprecedented adventure that takes you into the deepest depths of darkness. In this game, you will be the hero facing terrifying challenges and complex puzzles while trying to survive in an environment full of dangers.Suspenseful story: Explore hidden secrets and a mysterious story that takes you to places you never expected.

Unique Puzzles: Test your wits against meticulously designed puzzles that require quick thinking and smart solutions.

Terrifying Creatures: Be prepared to face terrifying enemies that appear when you least expect it.

Dynamic Environment: Live a unique experience with a distinctive world design, full of detail and excitement.

Challenge you now:

Can you overcome the challenges and escape with your life? Or will you be stuck in the dark forever? 

A wonderful surprise is coming!

Stay tuned for a new update soon that will add new features and amazing challenges to improve your game experience! Make sure you are ready to discover everything new.
name: Find The Keys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Discover a world full of excitement and horror!
